Find Out More

We believe there are no boundaries!

At Codes without Borders, we are fully commited to raising Nigeria's next generation of Programmers. We believe in the unalienable right of access of the Nigerian Child to, at least, basic useful Computer Science education, because we know as a matter of fact, that no matter their eventual chosen career, Computers and technology will play a central role.

Our Events

Hour of Code

This December, we are going to a School in Lagos, to organize a Hour of Code, marking our first Event and launch

Teach a Child!

This December, spend an hour with a public School Child, tutoring them in the Hour of Code, it doesn't matter whether you can find your way around a Computer or not, all that is required of you is either your Laptop, Tablet or Smart Phone. Together let's start building this Army, You will have fun, we promise.

Let's Get In Touch!

Ready to support us, or maybe you just need a little more information? That's great! Give us a call or send us an email and we will get back to you as soon as possible!
